details.ability: HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.
Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.
HOME: You are always the 1st player, superseding all other claimants.
+2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.
Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.
HOME: Boost direct to Home Bernal without doubling boost costs.
Your factory-assisted landings/liftoffs anywhere treat lander burns as normal Burn Spaces.
HOME: Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear X reactor.
Your Crew has an On-Board Nuclear ANY reactor.
HOME: Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege.
Gain the Skunkworks faction privilege & impose academia hand limit on all opponents.
HOME: +1 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.
+2 to the Net Thrust of your Spacecraft that use Solar-Power.
HOME: You are immune to budget cuts.
Gain +1 Token VP for each Colony Dome. Your Crew and Human Colonists have a rad-hard of at least 7.
HOME: (Module 0) Your delegates in the Ideology of your Faction color are +1 VP each.
(Module 0) Your delegates in the assembly are +1 VP each.
HOME: Can designate any Spacecraft to forgo Belt Rolls in the Radiation Belts near Earth.
+2 VP per Dirtside for this Bernal.
All your other cards have +1 rad-hardness.
All your other cards have +3 rad-hardness.
HOME: Gain the Powersat faction privilege.
Gain the Powersat faction privilege. Powersat push includes a Bonus Pivot.

details.future: MINI-BLACK HOLE FUTURE: Req = Industrialized centaur with 10 isotope FTs. Effects = double all isotope refuel, 10 VP.

MASS BEAM FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with Io or Triton Dirtside. Effects = your Powersat adds +2 thrust, 7 VP.
LITHIATED AMMONIA ICE STARSHIP FUTURE: Req = Ad astra exit with 10 isotope fuel. Effect = 14 VP.
SPACEFARING FUTURE: Req = Bernal with 8+ dirtside hydration. Effects = Allowed 1 extra Colonist, 7 VP.
ENZMANN STARSHIP FUTURE: Req = Ad astra exit with 2 Promoted Colonists + Mobile Factory. Effect = 12 VP.
FUSION CANDLE FUTURE: Req = Triton Colony & Promoted Bernal with Neptune Aerostat Dirtside. Effects = double all isotope refuel, 14 VP.

JELLYBOTS: Colocated industrialization is a free action.
NANITES: One re-roll if fail 1 or more size rolls.
